main event: A civilian witnessed a bright, disc-shaped object in the sky on March 2, 1969.
interesting points: The object gave off a brilliant white light,The object moved upward at a terrific speed,The witness initially thought it was an airplane due to its slow, steady movement,The report reflects a change in the witness's attitude towards UFO research,The sighting lasted for several minutes before the object disappeared from view.
sighted object: disc-shaped object emitting bright white light
witness description: The primary witness changed from a debunker to being open-minded after the sighting, and two relatives were called to observe the object.
